name: Barbell Hip Thrust
description: Place the bar over your hips, look forward and raise the weights. Your knees should be in a 90 degrees angle at the top of the exercise. Tuck your chin in to your chest during the exerise, look forward, push from your heels

name: Barbell Sumo Deadlift
description: You should have a bit wider stance for this exercise compared to regular deadlifts. Remember to not bend your bakc during the exercise, since it may cause injury. Lift with your legs at the bottom of the exercise and stabilize with the back

name: Dumbbell Bulgarian Split Squat
description: Place one foot on the bench and stand on the other. Keep your spine straight and neutral.

name: Leg Extension Machine
description: So not overstretch or bend your back at the top of the exercise. Stop in the top position where your back is straight. Trick: Point toes outward a bit, which makes it easier to feel the contract.

name: Barbell Bench Press
description: Lower the weight diwb ti cgest kevek and then press upwards while extending your arms.

name: Double Incline Chest Press
description: A great chest press variation that will put some extra pressure in the top of your chest and front shoulders.

name: Barbell Shoulder Presses
description: Have relaxed and tucked down shoulders in the start position. Push your chest slightly forward and contract you scapulas in the back.

name: Weighted Plate Front Raises
description: Holding a plate with your hads with somewhat straight hands and raise the up and down.

name: Warm Up
description: Run, Jog, do what ever and warm up your body

name: Power Walk
description: You can either perform this exercise inside or outside. But the purpose is to walk at a strong speed without starting to run.

name: Isolated Mountain Climbers
description: Put emphasis on the crunch at the top of the exercise

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: Don't throw up your legs in this exercise, work with controlled movements to fell the contact in the abs

name: Dumbell Neutral Grip Chest Press
description: Lie on a flat bench and hold a dumbbell in each hand. Maintain a neutral grip, that is the dumbbell faces the same direction as you are, and begin with your arems straight. Bend your arms and lower them to the sider of your body, pause and then lift your arms to repeat.

name: Barbell Romanian Deadlift
description: Have slightly bent knees during this exercise, do not lock them out. Your spine should be in a straight and neutral position, do no bend you back. Lower doen the weights to just below your knees, then return back up.

name: Dumbbell Reverse Lunge
description: Take a step backwards, keeping your upper body aligned and your back straight. Lower yourself enough for your front leg to be at a 90-degree angle

name: One Leg Legpress
description: Place your foot closer to middle then when doing a legpress with both feet.

name: Cable Kickbacks
description: If your don't have access to a cable machine, you can do regular standing kick-backs, with only body weight.

name: Hyper Extensions
description: Do not overstretch or bend your back at the top of the exercise. Stop of the top position where your lower back is straight.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Remember that it is you back, not your arms, that should be doing the heavy work in this exercise. If you find yourself pilling too much with your arms, lower the weight and try to find the contact in your back. To help you find the right contact, out your chin up and push your chest up.

name: Cable Narrow Grip Pulldowns
description: Keep your chest up and your back straight during this exercise.

name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
description: Bend forward at the hip and have the weight in one hand. The weight is hanging toward the floor. The weight is then pulled upward, closer to the chest, before loweing it back to the starting position.

name: Cable Rope Face-Pull
description: Pull the rope against your face, push your shoulders down, chest up and contract the scapulas.

name: Dumbbell Biceps Curls
description: Hold a dumbbel with your palm facing upward. Slowly curl the weight up by bending you elbow, keeping your elbow close to your body.

name: Dumbbell Biceps Spider Curls
description: Lay facing down on a little bit inclined bench. Have your chest supported by the head of the bench and let the weights hang down. Then perform bicep curls.

name: Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Have relaxed and tucked down shoulders in the start position. Push your chest slightly forward and contract you scapulas in the back.

name: Standing Dumbbell Lateral Raises
description: You shoulders should be pressed down in the start position. Push your chest up and forward and your lats back, isolate the shoulders by only moving your arms and shoulders during the exercise. Raise the dumbbells up to shoulder height. Do not swing the weights up and down.

name: Dumbbell Standing Back Flyes
description: Use really light weights and many reps in this exercise in order to isolate your rear delts and upper back

name: Dead-Bug
description: Lay on your back, raising and lowering opposite arms and legs while keeping your abdominal muschles engaged.

name: Row machine
description: If you don't have access to a row mahcine in your gym you can do a regular dumbbell or barbell rows.

name: Barbell Squat
description: Make sure you don't lean over with your back during the exercise. Keep your back steady and squat with your lower body only. Push your heels and perform a slow controlled movement when lowering the weights. Don't thrust at the top and don't lock your knees out.
